Loading the data
```{r}
setwd("C:/Training/Academy/R Course (C-DAC)/Datasets")
cars93 <- read.csv("Cars93.csv")
head(cars93)
```


Price Summary per type
```{r}
library(dplyr)
cars93 %>% 
  group_by(Type) %>%
  summarise(avgprice = mean(Price, na.rm = T),
            sd_price = sd(Price, na.rm=T))
```

Bar Chart of Price Summary
```{r}
summ_car <- cars93 %>% 
  group_by(Type) %>%
  summarise(avgprice = mean(Price, na.rm = T),
            sd_price = sd(Price, na.rm=T))
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = summ_car, aes(x=Type, y=avgprice, fill=Type))+
  geom_bar(stat='identity')
```
